statements: SELECT * FROM historical_images;
SELECT id, image_url FROM historical_images ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, image_url, description FROM historical_images WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM historical_images WHERE tags @> ARRAY['ancient'];
SELECT id, image_url, tags[1] AS first_tag FROM historical_images;
SELECT id, image_url, tags, description FROM historical_images WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM historical_images WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT image_url FROM historical_images WHERE tags @> ARRAY['nature'];
SELECT description FROM historical_images ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, image_url FROM historical_images WHERE description ILIKE '%vintage%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM photographs
SELECT photo_name, photo_date FROM photographs WHERE photo_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT tag_name FROM tags ORDER BY tag_name ASC
SELECT photo_name, photo_description FROM photographs WHERE photo_date < '2022-05-01' ORDER BY photo_date DESC
SELECT photo_id, photo_name, jsonb_array_length(tags) AS tag_count FROM photographs
SELECT * FROM photographs WHERE photo_id = 1;
SELECT photo_name, photo_description FROM photographs WHERE photo_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT photo_id, photo_name, photo_date FROM photographs WHERE tags @> '[{"tag":"vacation"}]';
SELECT photo_name, tag_name FROM photographs JOIN tags ON photographs.tags @> '[{"tag":"landscape"}]';
SELECT * FROM photographs ORDER BY photo_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM photos;
SELECT photo_id, photo_name, description FROM photos WHERE tag_id = 1;
SELECT photo_id, photo_name, tag_name FROM photos JOIN tags ON photos.tag_id = tags.tag_id;
SELECT photo_name, description FROM photos WHERE photo_id = 3;
SELECT photo_id, photo_name FROM photos ORDER BY photo_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM photos WHERE photo_id = 1;
SELECT photo_name, description FROM photos WHERE tag_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT tag_name, COUNT(*) AS tag_count FROM tags t JOIN photo_tag_map ptm ON t.tag_id = ptm.tag_id GROUP BY tag_name;
SELECT p.photo_name, t.tag_name FROM photos p JOIN photo_tag_map ptm ON p.photo_id = ptm.photo_id JOIN tags t ON ptm.tag_id = t.tag_id WHERE description LIKE '%beautiful%';
SELECT p.photo_name, t.tag_name FROM photos p JOIN photo_tag_map ptm ON p.photo_id = ptm.photo_id JOIN tags t ON ptm.tag_id = t.tag_id ORDER BY p.photo_name DESC, t.tag_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM HistoricalPhotographs;
SELECT id, image_url, description FROM HistoricalPhotographs WHERE date_taken > '2020-01-01';
SELECT tag_name FROM Tag ORDER BY tag_name ASC;
SELECT id, tag_ids FROM HistoricalPhotographs WHERE ARRAY_LENGTH(tag_ids) > 1;
SELECT image_id, comment, commenter_name FROM ImageComments WHERE comment_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY comment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM HistoricalPhotographs WHERE date_taken < '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, image_url, description FROM HistoricalPhotographs WHERE image_url LIKE '%beach%';
SELECT image_id, tag_name FROM ImageTagMapping JOIN Tag ON ImageTagMapping.tag_id = Tag.id;
SELECT * FROM ImageComments WHERE commenter_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY comment_date DESC;
SELECT id, tag_name FROM Tag WHERE id IN (SELECT tag_id FROM ImageTagMapping WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000');
SELECT * FROM historical_photos ORDER BY date_taken DESC
SELECT image_url, description FROM historical_photos WHERE id = 1
SELECT tag_name FROM tags WHERE tag_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT photographer_name, upload_date FROM photographers JOIN photo_uploads ON photographers.photographer_id = photo_uploads.photographer_id
SELECT * FROM photo_tags JOIN tags ON photo_tags.tag_id = tags.tag_id WHERE photo_id = 2
SELECT * FROM historical_photos ORDER BY date_taken DESC, id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT image_url, description FROM historical_photos WHERE date_taken >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_taken ASC;
SELECT hp.id, hp.image_url, t.tag_name FROM historical_photos hp JOIN photo_tags pt ON hp.id = pt.photo_id JOIN tags t ON pt.tag_id = t.tag_id;

SELECT ph.photographer_name, COUNT(*) as total_uploads FROM photographers ph JOIN photo_uploads pu ON ph.photographer_id = pu.photographer_id GROUP BY ph.photographer_name ORDER BY total_uploads DESC;

SELECT hp.date_taken, t.tag_name, pu.upload_date FROM historical_photos hp JOIN photo_tags pt ON hp.id = pt.photo_id JOIN tags t ON pt.tag_id = t.tag_id JOIN photo_uploads pu ON hp.id = pu.photo_id ORDER BY hp.date_taken DESC, pu.upload_date ASC;
